sections.TOP: Arsenal of Braavos021695g488h39esx3zhixex2rzhz88fwkl7cs1281052014-04-20T03:38:40ZGonzalo848331/* See also */The '''Arsenal''' is an island citadel guarding the sea entrance to the [[Free City]] of [[Braavos]]. It is located  at the entrance to the lagoon, just beyond the [[Titan of Braavos|Titan]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels the Arsenal sits upon a knob of rock, fortified with stone battlements and bristling with scorpions, trebuchets, and spitfires. The Arsenal is also a dock with room for dozens of galleys. It houses the defense fleet of the city and is the center of shipbuilding in Braavos. It is said that a war galley can be built in a day there.
